DEGREES CONFERRED Degrees conferred between July 1, 2010 and June 30, 2011. Percentages of degrees awarded are based on number of majors, not headcount (e.g. students with one degree but a double major will be represented twice). Percentages are calculated using the sum of first and second majors in each area of the IPEDS
